name: The Curious Case of the Missing Will
name_original: The Curious Case of the Missing Will
description:
Plenty of games have let you play as Sherlock Holmes, but have you ever wanted to be John Watson? Now you can! Except you're not even some retired army surgeon, you're just a painter, and a sad one to boot.

How to Play: The Dialogue on the left side will update automatically, (or speed it up with the ">>" button at the bottom). On the right hand side, images will appear after a while. You can drag these images into the frame above and arrange your own painting for points! But beware, your actions here might affect the story.

The Curious Case of the Missing Will was made for the GMTK Jam 2018. I interpreted the theme to make a Detective Game without Detecting.
